title: Bug 20956Emulated CoolItem do not respect SWT.DROPDOWN flag
description: Bug 20956Emulated CoolItem do not respect SWT.DROPDOWN flag build 20020624A CoolItem should only has the chevron when the SWT.DROPDOWN flag is set, butthe emulated CoolItem always has it doesn't matter if the flag is set or not.ControlExample shows this bug.I think we should fix this after 2.0.
